Text: How come it's so big at 24fps? Does it have all the features from the disc too?

How do you get english subs to work during non english speaking parts? Thanks

@Will300 - you cannot. This version does not have the necessary subs for non-English speaking parts, alas.

@BOXZ - this is hardly the benchmark 1080p encode for this movie. Nice transfer, but if it cannot even have the subs for non-English speaking parts like a 720p less than half its size, then it doesn't say much for your contention of its 'best of the best' tag.
i painstaking'ly downloaded / checked out 3 different copies of first class from pBAY, this was the best one.
